flawed_nl_solution:
Vinnie has written a total of 450 words on Saturday + 650 words on Sunday = <<450+650=1010>>1010 words.
He has therefore exceeded the limit by 1010 written words - 1000 word limit = <<1010-1000=10>>10 words.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1100, not 1010. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
